item.title: About
item.description: My name is Tolga Kara. I am PhD student in Atmospheric Science at ITU. Within my research I am mainly interested in renewable energy related topics, such as the improving wind power production forecasting in short and long term purposes, resource assessment, atmospheric influences upon the wind energy resource observations, and the interaction of wind farms with the atmospheric boundary layer.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
